column5: It was such a nice day I just had to get outside after the Christmas meal. I packed the hiking/snowshoe trails with the snowmobile, then headed out to the ice shack for a couple of hours of fishing. I know what is on the Boxing Day lunch menu. Merry Christmas to all.
Hurry back rich,your missing all the balmy weather here!
Merry Christmas to all my Canadian fishing friends!

Well at least there should not be any thin ice for those brave ice fisherman. Hope everyone enjoys their Christmas and it would be funny to hear on any fishing gifts that loved ones gave that “meant well” but probably never get packed on a trip
Merry Christmas John!
So got lucky again.Another grouse/woodpecker pic.This one from my kitchen window.
Good ice all around my end Have heard of areas on LOTW that are thin.Hope people are carefull.No fishing gear came my way.Which is good.I have enough.
Just a card from the wife,saying I better go fishing more,I didn't argue it.
Best present a guy could ask for.
Same to you.Hope to see you next year.lol.
Merry Christmas to all and to all a good bite!
Like to wish everyone a Merry Christmas from Canada.Have a safe holiday season.
Merry Christmas John!
Same to you john,my merry Christmas wish would be,living in your neighbor hood,so I could get'er done everyday up there on the water.
Same to you and Ms Sylvia. Please tell her I said Merry Christmas to her as well. Please stay safe this winter.. PjShorthorn
That be cool.Couple places for sale on Edward.JFYI.lol.
[QUOTE=pjshorthorn;6703133]Same to you and Ms Sylvia. Please tell her I said Merry Christmas to her as well. Please stay safe this winter..Will do.
John had to correct me,so I'll correct you (Silvia).
Lol.
Merry Christmas & Happy Holidays to all and here’s my Christmas feast
Only in Thai,looks awesome!
